title: Distributing the negative sign
text: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to remove parentheses. $$6w^2+24w+24-3w^2-6w+3$$ $$=$$ $$6w^2+24w+24-3w^2+6w-3$$
speech: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to remove parentheses.  6 w squared, plus 24 w plus 24 minus 3 w squared, minus 6 w plus 3   is equal to   6 w squared, plus 24 w plus 24 minus 3 w squared, plus 6 w minus 3
pacedSpeech: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to remove parentheses.   6 w squared, plus 24 w plus 24 minus 3 w squared, minus 6 w plus 3
6 w squared, plus 24 w plus 24 minus 3 w squared, plus 6 w minus 3

title: Grouping like terms
text: The next step is to group like terms. $$6w^2+24w+24-3w^2+6w-3$$ $$=$$ $$6w^2-3w^2+24w+6w+24-3$$
speech: The next step is to group like terms.  6 w squared, plus 24 w plus 24 minus 3 w squared, plus 6 w minus 3   is equal to   6 w squared, minus 3 w squared, plus 24 w plus 6 w plus 24 minus 3
pacedSpeech: The next step is to group like terms.   6 w squared, plus 24 w plus 24 minus 3 w squared, plus 6 w minus 3
6 w squared, minus 3 w squared, plus 24 w plus 6 w plus 24 minus 3

title: Combining and simplifying
speech: Finally, simplify the expression.  6 w squared, minus 3 w squared, plus 24 w plus 6 w plus 24 minus 3   is equal to   3 w squared, plus 30 w plus 21
pacedSpeech: Finally, simplify the expression.   6 w squared, minus 3 w squared, plus 24 w plus 6 w plus 24 minus 3
